title: HAP 07 - Richard Parkinson on Egyptian Poetry
itunes:title: HAP 07 - Richard Parkinson on Egyptian Poetry
description: Egyptioogist Richard Parkinson joins us to talk about the context and meaning of the Eloquent Peasant and other literary works of ancient Egypt.
content:encoded: Egyptioogist Richard Parkinson joins us to talk about the context and meaning of the Eloquent Peasant and other literary works of ancient Egypt.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
